channel.title: Dicing
channel.description:
Hey,
I want to make a Dicing program in Visual basic for all the old types of dicing. I'm going to use it to host events in my P-Server.
Can anyone give me a code for 55x2.
Thanks.

item.title: Dicing
item.dc:creator: @New_Legacy New Legacy
item.description:
@New_Legacy wrote:

I found a method on YouTube, and It worked fine. So I am trying to add text around it and I get this error.

A first chance exception of type 'System.InvalidCastException' occurred in Microsoft.VisualBasic.dll Conversion from string "You have Rolled the Number 100 O" to type 'Double' is not valid.

From this code;

Private Sub Button8_Click(sender As System.Object, e As System.EventArgs) Handles Button8.Click Dim ht As New Hashtable Dim rannum, i As Integer i = 1 Do Until ht.Count = 1 Randomize() rannum = Int(Rnd() * 100) If Not ht.ContainsValue(rannum) And rannum > 1 Then ht.Add(i, rannum) i += 1 End If Loop MsgBox("You have rolled a", TextBox8.Text = ht(1), "on the Percentile Dice.") End Sub

Read full topic

item.title: Dicing
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Wat?

Dim random As New Random()
Dim randomNumber As Integer = random.[Next](0, 100)

item.title: Dicing
item.dc:creator: @New_Legacy New Legacy
item.description:
@New_Legacy wrote:

No. I want it in a VB Application so others can get it to. I don’t want it done server side, so not wrong section.

Read full topic

item.title: Dicing
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Firstly … you don’t need vb to create some random numbers for you on a private server. Just make a command or have an item spit it out.

Secondly … wrong section. Server Help

Read full topic
